name: Night of The Vampire: Blood Moon
name_original: Night of The Vampire: Blood Moon
description:
This is a project created for the University of Bolton's Masters Course.  The task was to create a tower defense game in six weeks. 

This is Night of The Vampire: Blood Moon. An updated remake/sequel to a project made in a previous year, Night of The Vampire. This is a tower defense game where the player is must prepare his defenses against oncoming hordes of vampiric and beastly invaders by strategically placing turrets and consumables.  But beware! The magical blood moon will rise, and you will be unable to build any new turrets! Plan ahead and prepare yourself accordingly!

If you would like to help improve the game, please fill out this post-game questionnaire: https://forms.gle/Eyuz6cMznaLj9s5C6 

Any and all feedback and criticism is welcome! Thank you for your time!
